snippet: SCALICI--Josephine, of Staten Island, NY, died peacefully at age 87 at Calvary Hospice, Manhattan, on February 25, 2016, with her daughter at her side. Sister of Marie Brand, Joseph Depperman, Anthony Depperman, and Grace Roby. Predeceased by husband Carmelo (Mel) in 1981 and sister Lillian Scalici in 2002. Loving mother of sons Joseph, Steven, daughter Susan and two grandchildren. Beloved aunt of many nieces and nephews. Josephine was a jeweler, together with her husband, a gemologist, owned and operated their own jewelry business, was greatly loved and will be missed by many. Visitation at Frank E. Campbell Funeral Chapel, 1076 Madison Avenue, New York, NY, Wednesday, March 2, 2016, 6pm-9pm. Catholic Memorial Mass at Holy Family Chapel at Mary Manning Walsh Home, 1339 York Avenue, New York, NY, Thursday March 3, 2016, at 9:30am. Burial to follow at St. Mary's Cemetery, Staten Island, NY. The family sends its sincere thanks to the attending physicians, surgeons, medical interns, residents and nursing staff of 4 Uris and the Palliative Medicine team at Lenox Hill Hospital, for their kindness, compassion and superior care. In lieu of flowers, donations can be made to the Lenox Hill Hospital Palliative Medicine Program in memory of Josephine Scalici. Lenox Hill Hospital, 100 East 77th Street, New York, NY, 10075, Attn: Development Office, L. McGrain. 1/3
